text: John McKee Spratt Jr. (November 1, 1942 â€“ December 14, 2024) was an American Democratic politician. He was the U.S. representative for from 1983 to 2011. Spratt was diagnosed with Parkinson's disease in 2010. He died on December 14, 2024 from problems caused by the disease at the age of 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1942 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:United States representatives from South Carolina Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Charlotte, North Carolina
